text:
Eects on Weight in Bipolar

Disorder

Abstract

Bipolar disorder (BD) is a complex mental health condition characterized by

extreme mood swings, ranging rom manic highs to depressive lows. While the

primary ocus o BD research has been on its psychological and emotional

aspects, recent studies have highlighted the signifcant impact o the disorder

on physical health, particularly weight management. This report aims to

provide an in-depth examination o the eects o bipolar disorder on weight,
